content.question: The three lightbulbs in the circuit above are identical, and the battery has zero internal resistance. When switch S is closed to cause bulb 1 to light, which of the other two bulbs increase(s) in brightness?

choices.label: It cannot be determined without knowing the emf of the battery.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
